# FitCycle Project Instructions

This file contains instructions for GitHub Copilot to assist with the FitCycle e-commerce platform development.

## Project Overview

FitCycle is a B2C e-commerce platform for sports and fitness equipment rentals and sales.

## Technology Stack

- Frontend: HTML, CSS, JavaScript
- Development: Visual Studio Code with Live Server

## Module Structure

- Public/Guest (8.1)
- Authentication (8.2)
- Customer (8.3)
- Vendor/Partner (8.4)
- Product Management (8.5)
- Order Management (8.6)
- Payment (8.7)
- Admin (8.8)

## Features

- AR Body Scan
- AI Recommendations
- FitScoreâ„¢ Index
